idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 0.2.1 Add support for Android Studio 3.4.2 (and 2018.3).
  • 0.2.0 Add opacity to various colors.
  • 0.1.3 Add compatibility for newer versions and an icon.
  • 0.1.2 There is a different color when a file is selected in the project pane but is not focused.
  • 0.1.1 The button to close the editor tabs is now brighter.
  • 0.1.0 Initial release. Basic theme functionality.
idea-plugin.name: Gruvbox Theme
idea-plugin.description:
gruvbox is heavily inspired by badwolf, jellybeans and solarized.
Designed as a bright theme with pastel 'retro groove' colors and light/dark mode switching in the way of solarized. The main focus when developing gruvbox is to keep colors easily distinguishable, contrast enough and still pleasant for the eyes.
